articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed, breaking ranks with Wall Street - CNBC
articles.description: Core consumer prices in Tokyo rose at a slower pace in August, easing from July's 2.9% increase.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets traded mixed Friday, breaking ranks with Wall Street as investors also assessed a slate of economic data in the region.
Japan's Nikkei 225 slid 0.41%, while the Topix lost 0.39%… [+1749 chars]
